headline: Husband, 32, With 'Months To Live' Has $1.2M Life Insurance And Asks If He Should Put 50% Of It In Annuity So His Wife Doesn't Blow It

"I have a $1,200,000 life insurance [policy] w/ my wife as beneficiary… What should I do to ensure my wife gets the money w/o difficulty? headline: Andreessen Horowitz Makes a $3 Billion Bet Against the AI Bubble
summary: A two-month-old AI computer company raised a massive $475 million seed round, with plans to secure even more financing soon.  The exuberance for all things AI has rapidly spilled over into the normally staid field of developer tools, benchmarking services and back-end systems — areas that most regular consumers will never encounter directly — becoming a focal point for a new wave of tech investment.  To a16z, the word infrastructure encompasses any AI software marketed to technical buyers, rather than consumers.
